org.epics.ca.impl.remote
Interface ResponseRequest

All Known Subinterfaces:
DataResponse, SubscriptionRequest
All Known Implementing Classes:
ChannelArrayRequestImpl, ChannelGetFieldRequestImpl, ChannelGetRequestImpl, ChannelMonitorImpl, ChannelProcessRequestImpl, ChannelPutGetRequestImpl, ChannelPutRequestImpl, ChannelRPCRequestImpl
public interface ResponseRequest

A request that expects an response. Responses identified by its I/O ID. This interface needs to be extended (to provide method called on response).

Version:
$Id$
Author:
Matej Sekoranja
